name: 2024 7th International Conference on Mechatronics, Robotics and Automation
content: Publication: All full papers accepted by ICMRA 2024 will be published into ICMRA 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in IEEE Xplore, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and other indexing services.
organizers: School of Computer Science & Engineering, School of Artificial Intelligence of Wuhan Institute of Te
